data.text:
It's summer training camp. The one of the staff members 
was nice enough to share some freshly caught fish with me.
data.processed:
<story>It's summer training camp. The one of the staff members 
<story>was nice enough to share some freshly caught fish with me.

data.text:
I was thinking about sharing some with Tap Dance City, 
when I heard her talking to another student.
data.processed:
<story>I was thinking about sharing some with Tap Dance City, 
<story>when I heard her talking to another student.

data.text: Alrighty! You better believe I'm taking on that challenge!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Alrighty! You better believe I'm taking on that challenge!

data.text: Trainer! We're setting sail!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Speak of the devil, I was wondering if—
choices.processed: <size=42>Speak of the devil, I was wondering if—</size>

data.processed: <story>Trainer! We're setting sail!

data.text: Sorry! Leave that for later! Come on now!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Sorry! Leave that for later! Come on now!

data.text:
Now, look over there. 
Can you see that island in the distance?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Now, look over there. 
<story>Can you see that island in the distance?

data.text:
I looked across the ocean, and sure enough, there was an island 
not too far from the beach. It looks it's deserted, though.
data.processed:
<story>I looked across the ocean, and sure enough, there was an island 
<story>not too far from the beach. It looks it's deserted, though.

data.text:
We're heading there asap! 
Let's prepare for our adventure!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>We're heading there asap! 
<story>Let's prepare for our adventure!

data.text: Because on that island... There's treasure waiting for us!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Because on that island... There's treasure waiting for us!

data.text:
There's a legend at the school. Supposedly, a student 
from long, long ago snuck over to that island one night 
and hid something there.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>There's a legend at the school. Supposedly, a student 
<story>from long, long ago snuck over to that island one night 
<story>and hid something there.

data.text:
There's many theories on what it might be. A box full of 
gold and silver? A magic lamp that grants any wish? 
The thing is, no one's ever found it!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>There's many theories on what it might be. A box full of 
<story>gold and silver? A magic lamp that grants any wish? 
<story>The thing is, no one's ever found it!

data.text:
There's only one thing to do! 
We'll have to find it ourselves!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>There's only one thing to do! 
<story>We'll have to find it ourselves!

data.text: First things first... We need a boat! Let's work together and build a hella cool one!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: First things first... We need a boat! Let's work together and build a hella cool one!

data.text:
And so, we decided to build a boat――
Or more accurately, a raft to get to the island.
data.processed:
<story>And so, we decided to build a boat――
<story>Or more accurately, a raft to get to the island.

data.text:
Although, chopping down a random tree without permission 
wouldn't be a good idea. What to do...
data.processed:
<story>Although, chopping down a random tree without permission 
<story>wouldn't be a good idea. What to do...

data.text: Hmm... We have a bit of a problem here, Trainer.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Hmm... We have a bit of a problem here, Trainer.

data.text:
Should it be a skull? Perhaps a dragon, actually... 
No, maybe something unusual like an Umamusume?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Should it be a skull? Perhaps a dragon, actually... 
<story>No, maybe something unusual like an Umamusume?

data.text:
We're going adventuring with this boat, right? 
Then we need to decide on its flag, first and foremost!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>We're going adventuring with this boat, right? 
<story>Then we need to decide on its flag, first and foremost!

data.text:
...Of all the the problems we're having, 
her head has beached on the flag's design?!
data.processed:
<story>...Of all the the problems we're having, 
<story>her head has beached on the flag's design?!

data.text: Shit! The treasure's so close I can almost touch it! It's so unfair!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Shit! The treasure's so close I can almost touch it! It's so unfair!

data.text:
――Just then, it dawned on me. 
There might just be a way...
data.processed:
<story>――Just then, it dawned on me. 
<story>There might just be a way...

data.text: Hm? Sure...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Hm? Sure...

data.text:
The sun's already set. 
Where the heck did they go?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>The sun's already set. 
<story>Where the heck did they go?

data.text:
Trainer?! What have you been doing? 
...And you're wearing a pirate hat?!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Trainer?! What have you been doing? 
<story>...And you're wearing a pirate hat?!

data.text: Wha—?! Are you serious?!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Wha—?! Are you serious?!

data.text:
Whoa! That's a nice boat you've got there! 
And it has a flag with a skull and crossbones, too!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Whoa! That's a nice boat you've got there! 
<story>And it has a flag with a skull and crossbones, too!

data.text:
So yeah, I managed to get us a boat via the staff member who gave 
me the fish earlier. Oh, and I made the pirate flag myself.
data.processed:
<story>So yeah, I managed to get us a boat via the staff member who gave 
<story>me the fish earlier. Oh, and I made the pirate flag myself.

data.text:
I got a bit carried away and even made a pirate hat... 
But it's all worth it, because now we can go to the island!

choices.text: It's time to raise the anchor, captain!

data.processed:
<story>I got a bit carried away and even made a pirate hat... 
<story>But it's all worth it, because now we can go to the island!

data.text: Hehe... Hahaha!!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Hehe... Hahaha!!

data.text:
That's what I'm talking about! 
I knew you were the perfect person to set sail with!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>That's what I'm talking about! 
<story>I knew you were the perfect person to set sail with!

data.text:
Let's raise the flag at the bow! 
Full speed ahead!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Let's raise the flag at the bow! 
<story>Full speed ahead!

data.text: We're finally here. It's so quiet...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>We're finally here. It's so quiet...

data.text:
Now that we're actually here, this deserted island is pretty creepy 
at night. I'm starting to feel a little scared...
data.processed:
<story>Now that we're actually here, this deserted island is pretty creepy 
<story>at night. I'm starting to feel a little scared...

data.text: Sound your fanfare♪ All the way to the goal♪
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Sound your fanfare♪ All the way to the goal♪

data.text:
You're gonna make your pirate hat cry if you stay nervous like that. 
I thought a little singing would cheer you right up!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>You're gonna make your pirate hat cry if you stay nervous like that. 
<story>I thought a little singing would cheer you right up!

data.text: After a long trek through the island――
data.processed: <story>After a long trek through the island――

data.text: Trainer! Come over here!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Trainer! Come over here!

data.text: Take a look at this boulder.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Take a look at this boulder.

data.text:
In front of her is a massive boulder, at least 2 meters tall. 
Looking closer, something's carved into the side of it...
data.processed:
<story>In front of her is a massive boulder, at least 2 meters tall. 
<story>Looking closer, something's carved into the side of it...

data.text: "Together, we will fulfill our dreams"
data.processed: <story>"Together, we will fulfill our dreams"

data.text:
Underneath that quote is the name of an Umamusume, 
and next to it, a human name. These are――
data.processed:
<story>Underneath that quote is the name of an Umamusume, 
<story>and next to it, a human name. These are――

data.text:
This name... I feel like I've seen it somewhere before. 
That's right. I remember...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>This name... I feel like I've seen it somewhere before. 
<story>That's right. I remember...

data.text:
An Umamusume who left a great mark on racing history. 
The other name is her trainer's.
data.processed:
<story>An Umamusume who left a great mark on racing history. 
<story>The other name is her trainer's.

data.text: Hahaha! Ahahahahaha!!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Hahaha! Ahahahahaha!!

data.text:
They got us good! I get it now...! 
There was never any treasure here!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>They got us good! I get it now...! 
<story>There was never any treasure here!

data.text:
The real treasure we've been chasing all this time... 
It's the marks of an adventure that these two 
amazing people had together!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>The real treasure we've been chasing all this time... 
<story>It's the marks of an adventure that these two 
<story>amazing people had together!

data.text:
We made it back to the mainland. As we looked back at the island 
we just explored in the distance, Tap Dance City softly spoke...
data.processed:
<story>We made it back to the mainland. As we looked back at the island 
<story>we just explored in the distance, Tap Dance City softly spoke...

data.text:
How strange... We returned without finding anything tangible. 
And yet, I feel like I've returned with many feelings and memories.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>How strange... We returned without finding anything tangible. 
<story>And yet, I feel like I've returned with many feelings and memories.

data.text: ... It was a great adventure, don't you agree?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>... It was a great adventure, don't you agree?

data.text:
Let's leave our mark as well. Proof of the greatest adventure 
the world will ever see, in the history of racing. 
Let's build that castle for everyone to live in, too!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Let's leave our mark as well. Proof of the greatest adventure 
<story>the world will ever see, in the history of racing. 
<story>Let's build that castle for everyone to live in, too!

data.text:
Let's do this together, my cremmate! We'll challenge even the 
wildest of seas! We'll grab hold of our dreams, no matter what!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Let's do this together, my cremmate! We'll challenge even the 
<story>wildest of seas! We'll grab hold of our dreams, no matter what!

data.text: Our route is endless... It continues on forever and ever!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Our route is endless... It continues on forever and ever!
